channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nature: Lake Champlain in New York
item.description: We leave you this Sunday Morning along the frozen shores of Lake Champlain in upper New York State. Videographer: Jamie McDonald.

item.title: Rubio claims US is running 'the direction' of Venezuela situation

item.title: World reaction to U.S. strikes on Venezuela pours in
item.description: Many U.S. adversaries condemned the U.S. strikes on Venezuela, while other governments called for deescalation.

item.title: Gunmen raid village in Nigeria, killing at least 30 people and abducting others
item.description: Gunmen have killed at least 30 villagers and abducted several others in northern Nigeria’s Niger state, according to police

item.title: 'It's a violation of the law': Schumer criticizes decision to strike Venezuela
item.description: "You don't treat lawlessness with other lawlessness," the Senate minority leader said.

item.title: Wisconsin judge convicted of obstructing arrest of immigrant resigns as GOP threatens impeachment
